definition: (increasing) day by day/(more critical) with every passing day/gradually
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
sun/day/date, day of the month
to hasten/to hurry/to walk fast/to approach/to tend towards/to converge
more critical with every passing day

sentences.english: L/C Payment problem is becoming serious to each bank.
sentences.chinese: 信用证垫款问题是各银行面对的日趋严重的一个问题。

sentences.english: Occurring and harming of the wheat aphids have not decreased, and there is a more serious trend instead.
sentences.chinese: 麦蚜的发生危害没有减轻，反而有日趋严重的趋势。

sentences.english: But the current spat has become much more hostile, with both sides announcing live-fire naval drills were recently held.
sentences.chinese: 但目前争论日趋尖锐，双方近期都宣布进行实弹演习。

sentences.english: But the Sino-Japanese War after the increasingly conservative in their thoughts.
sentences.chinese: 但甲午战争以后，其思想日趋保守。

sentences.english: The old woman has been worn away by her recent illness.
sentences.chinese: 由于最近生病，老妇人的身体日趋衰弱。

sentences.english: Jiaozhou Bay and its adjacent area are getting more and more important in the economic and social development of Tsingtao city.
sentences.chinese: 胶州湾及其邻区在青岛市经济和社会发展中日趋重要。

sentences.english: The traditional forestry shadow is desalinating day by day.
sentences.chinese: 传统林业的影子正在日趋淡化。
实际上郊区贫困化问题正在日趋严重。

sentences.english: Spa resorts have continued to develop through SE Asia. The market is increasingly competitive.
sentences.chinese: 水疗度假设施在东南亚不断发展，市场竞争日趋激烈。

sentences.english: They learned the concept of monasticism from the Buddhists, who greatly influenced Taoism during this period.
sentences.chinese: 这一时期的道教也不断借鉴佛教的经验而日趋成熟。

sentences.english: It was Institutionalization and gradual perfection of the Dual-system under the control of the country.
sentences.chinese: 在国家的影响下，“双元制”的制度化并日趋完善。

sentences.english: The ranks of teachers of the non-governmental vocational colleges are continuously growing and the sources of teachers have been diversified.
sentences.chinese: 民办高校的师资队伍也不断壮大，师资来源日趋多样。
建德投资环境日趋完善。

sentences.english: Cabaret expansion makes the competition between different cabarets become intensive.
sentences.chinese: 酒店数量的扩张使酒店之间的竞争日趋激烈。

sentences.english: Today, there are various cheating methods and advanced cheating skills.
sentences.chinese: 如今，作弊方式花样繁多，作弊技术也日趋先进。

sentences.english: There is a growing trend for people to pose naked for photographs in China.
sentences.chinese: 在中国，裸体写真日趋流行。

definition: day by day/more and more/increasingly/more and more with each passing day
to progress (or increase, change etc) day by day/more (or better etc) with each passing day
all the more/even more/further
to tend towards
to become more and more/to gradually become
all the more/increasingly
direction/trend/to incline
more and more
more critical with every passing day
to increase steadily/to grow with each passing day
increasingly/more and more/ever more/all the more
to intensify/to sharpen/to accelerate/to aggravate/to exacerbate/to embitter
gradually
along with/in the wake of/following
progressively/step by step
to develop rapidly
